item.title: Docker
item.description: Getting started Getting started Create and run a container in background 1 $ docker run -d -p 80:80 docker/getting-started -d - Run the container in detached mode -p 80:80 - Map port 80 to port 80 in the container docker/getting-started - The image to use {.style-none} Create and run a container in foreground 1 $ docker run -it -p 8001:8080 --name my-nginx nginx -it - Interactive bash mode -p 8001:8080 - Map port 8001 to port 8080 in the container --name my-nginx - Specify a name nginx - The image to use {.
